  • Cotton, Polyester, and 50/50: 266°F | Nylon: 302°F
  • Cotton, Polyester, and 50/50: 5 seconds Nylon: Preheat for 5 seconds and press for 5 seconds. remove liner and cover with a teflon sheet and press for another 10 seconds
  • Peel warm
  • Medium, even pressure
  • Cut right reading
  • Cotton, Polyester, Uncoated Nylon, 50/50 blends
  • Wash inside out. Tumble dry.

Additional Instructions

Cut your design right reading
Weed away excess material
Mask your design with a recommended mask
Remove the liner of the mask
Press your design at one of the temps and times listed above
Peel warm

CUT SETTINGS

Cut Settings for Graphtec CE6000:
 Settings can alter for each cutter and how dull or sharp the blade is. Test Cutting is Recommended.
1. Offset: 0
2. Speed: 25 cm/s
3. Acceleration: 4
4. Cut Force: 16
*HTW uses a 45 Degree Blade

Cut Settings for Silhouette Cameo:
Settings can alter on how dull or sharp the blade is. Test Cutting is Recommended.
1. Smooth Heat Transfer Material Setting
2. Blade at a 1
3. Speed at 5, Pressure at 6
4. Double Cut/Cut on Mat
